title: Where Forever Ends
description: 𝑴𝒚 𝒍𝒊𝒇𝒆 𝒊𝒔 𝒔𝒑𝒍𝒊𝒕 𝒊𝒏𝒕𝒐 𝒕𝒘𝒐 𝒑𝒂𝒓𝒕𝒔—𝒕𝒉𝒆𝒏 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒏𝒐𝒘. Then:I was a wife.Married to a man who was my world and the father of my child. Then, one day, half of my heart was ripped out of my chest.Now:I’m a widow.A single mom who has spent the last nine months trying like hell not to drown in an ocean of grief.I survive in the in-between, but surviving isn't the same as living, and I’m not sure what living looks like anymore.That is, until Jase Turner, my older brother’s best friend and my former crush, comes back into my life.We’re two people tethered together by strands of similar sorrow.My husband had my past.Jase wants my future.𝑨𝒏𝒅 𝒎𝒂𝒚𝒃𝒆 𝒘𝒉𝒆𝒓𝒆 𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒆𝒗𝒆𝒓 𝒆𝒏𝒅𝒔 𝒊𝒔 𝒋𝒖𝒔𝒕 𝒂 𝒅𝒊𝒇𝒇𝒆𝒓𝒆𝒏𝒕 𝒃𝒆𝒈𝒊𝒏𝒏𝒊𝒏𝒈.
author: K.  Street
